attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I HAVE SUFFERED FROM CLINICAL DEPRESSION, ALSO POST NATAL DEPRESSION, PILLS ALONE HELP BUT I FEEL THEY MASK SOME OF THE PROBLEMS, WHEN COUNCILLING WAS AVAILABLE ON NHS I FOUND IT VERY HELPFUL, I CAN NOT GET IT NOW AS I DO NOT HAVE THE LUXURY OF BEING ABLE TO AFFORD IT PRIVATELY.
I FEEL IT SHOULD BE FREE FOR ALL THAT NEED IT AND CANT AFFORD PRIVATE FEES

rejection.details: Please resubmit without using BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
